title: CAR MODEL detail Page Â» BRAND
user_story:
As a visitor\
On the CAR MODEL detail page\
I want to see a link to the connected BRAND\
So I can find more CAR MODELS they have created
description:
# **Acceptance Criteria**

**Behavior (Business logic)**

* the existing car model detail page is extended to display a prominent section for the connected brand
* this section contains:
  * a headline h2 describing the relationship
  * some relevant brand information
  * a link to the brand
* the section is not shown when there is no brand attached to the car model

**Quality Gates**

* Behavior tests (Playwright) are extended
* Accessibility tests are extended
* Performance tests are extended
* Local copy of the API spec is updated to a matching version
